hero.greeting: Hi! This is Do Vuong Phuc
hero.intro: A software engineer at Microsoft with the enthusiasm in AI
hero.graduated: Graduated as a valedictorian from the University of Science.
hero.projectsDesc1: Not only interest in software technologies
hero.projectsDesc2: I also research on machine learning models.
hero.expDesc1: I always willing to contribute my talent for society.

about.title: About me
about.p1: A backend engineer with 3 YoE in software engineer field. I am goal-oriented, dedicated to my work, and always open to new experiences, especially those related to my field of study, to enhance my coding practice.
about.p2: I have gained many from being a leader of group projects, which is why problem-solving, presentation and leadership skills are not weaknesses of mine. I have a strong passion for software engineering and computer science, and I hope I can contribute to the development of society.

microsoft.title: Software Engineer
microsoft.description: Using DotNet framework and Microsoft systems (e.g. Azure) to enhance the Exchange server with mail-related system. Develop a system to support on-call engineers when the incidents occurred. Leverage Copilot to give diagnostics and take action on the incidents automatically.

naver.title: Backend Engineer
naver.description: Design and develop large-scale zero-downtime systems with millions users. Using Java Spring & distributed systems on Naver cloud to implement social media platforms (Naver BBoom and Naver Blog). Responsible with DevOps task (e.g. build CI/CD pipeline). Building Slack chatbot with Slack Bolt to monitor the service when deploying.

upwork.title: Freelance Software/AI Engineer
upwork.description: Develop software tools and utilities (e.g. syntax checker, trading probabilistic calculator, simple compilers and algorithms to solve large data problems). Build dashboard to visualize data, analyze and provide insight from the dashboard. Build machine learning models and fine-tune them to achieve a good measure metrics (accuracy, F1-score, etc)

vbpo.title: Fullstack Blockchain Intern
vbpo.description: Research blockchain technologies and develop a blockchain-based application to digitalize real estates. Focus mainly in backend development and smart contract implement with NEAR and Aurora Engine.

outlook.title: Outlook
outlook.subtitle: Software | Microsoft
outlook.description: Microsoft Outlook is a personal information manager and email client used by millions of users worldwide. Working on this project involves maintaining and developing new features for the email, calendar, contacts, and tasks functionality across web and desktop platforms.

naverBlog.title: Blog (블로그)
naverBlog.subtitle: Software | Naver
naverBlog.description: Naver Blog is a social network which used to upload blogs. The service is used by many people in Korea, which has an extremely high traffic. In this project, we developed the map feature, which display blogs on Google Map & Naver Map. Moreover, we improved the RSS system.

naverBboom.title: BBoom (뿜)
naverBboom.subtitle: Software | Naver
naverBboom.description: A social network which used to upload humour posts and memes, titled as Naver BBoom. With millions of user, we are maintaining and improving all it's services. A lot of legacy features were optimized by us which reduce the latency and make the service more secure.

actionSpotting.title: Action Spotting
actionSpotting.subtitle: Machine learning | IJCNN
actionSpotting.description: A novel approach for precise action spotting in sports videos by unifying global and local scene entities modelling. The model achieved 1st place in SoccerNet-v2, FineDiving, and FineGym challenges. Published at IJCNN 2024.

dqnSnake.title: DQN snake
dqnSnake.subtitle: Machine learning
dqnSnake.description: Implement a snake game as the training environment for Deep Q-learning Network (DQN) model. The DQN then integrated with A* algorithm to help my agent solve the game. After training & fine-tune, my agent achieved the 1st prize in the university contest.

behaviourClassification.title: Behaviour classification
behaviourClassification.subtitle: Machine learning
behaviourClassification.description: An AI model which can detect user's pose from real-time camera then classify user's action. Compared to traditional action classification, this model can use frame-speed to distinguish similar actions (e.g. walk vs run) by leveraging MediaPipePose and LSTM.

ielts.title: IELTS 7.0 - English Proficiency Exam
ielts.description: IELTS is an English language proficiency exam that reports at all levels from low intermediate to very advanced. There is a general and academic version.

jlpt.title: JLPT N3 - Japanese Language Proficiency Test
jlpt.description: The Japanese-Language Proficiency Test (JLPT) is a standardized test to evaluate and certify Japanese language proficiency for non-native speakers. N3 is the intermediate level, demonstrating the ability to understand Japanese used in everyday situations to a certain degree.

msHackathon.title: Microsoft Global Hackathon 2025 - Innovative AI Project
msHackathon.description: Participated in the world's largest hackathon and demonstrated collaboration, inspiration, and creativity through an Innovative AI Project.

valedictorian.title: Valedictorian graduated with the highest GPA of class 2019
valedictorian.description: Anually received scholarship excellent students. Graduated valendictorian with the highest GPA (3.94/4) in the Information technology department over all the programmes.

upwork.title: Top-rated Upwork lancer
upwork.description: Top Rated highlights professionals who have built a strong reputation on Upwork by getting positive feedback from their clients, time after time. They represent the top 10% of talent on Upwork.

near.title: NEAR Advanced Development
near.description: A course on how to use NEAR Protocol to write smart contracts and integrate to an application. Furthermore, Aurora Engine and Octopus Network are also covered in the course. At the end of this course, learners must propose an software that use blockchain and build the prototype.

stepStem.title: STEP STEM Alive 2019 - 4th runner-up
stepStem.description: The programme sought to promote interest in STEM education and harness creativity in translating cross-curriculum knowledge into solutions for real-world issues to prepare participants to be self-directed learners, active solution contributors to the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals.

knime.title: Basic Proficiency in KNIME Analytics Platform
knime.description: Earners of this certificate have passed the L1 examination of KNIME Certification Program. Thereby they have demonstrated knowledge of the following topics: General concepts of KNIME Analytics Platform, importing/exporting data, data manipulation, and data aggregation.

shopee.title: Shopee Code League 2022 - Participant
shopee.description: Shopee Code League is a 2-week coding league consisting of two rounds of coding competitions, open to all students and professionals. Participants will put their coding skills to the test by solving challenging algorithmic puzzles designed by the Shopee Engineering team.

ieee.title: Unifying Global and Local Scene Entities Modelling for Precise Action Spotting
ieee.description: Propose a method to improve current action spotting vision models by unifying global and local feature. The method not only help AI model improving the accuracy but also more explainable By applying the GLIP - a zero-shot learning model of Google, the method can apply on arbitrary sports.

medium.title: Product recommendation for Huimitu ecommerce using Association Rule with KNIME
medium.organization: Medium | Low code for data science
medium.description: Story about how I built a recommendation system for an e-commerce (named Huimitu) system, using KNIME.
